resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104538</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104538</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200893</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Circuit Construction Kit (AC+DC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis-Aufbau-Installationssatz (AC+DC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kit de Construction de Circuit (AC+DC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo Da Construção Do Circuito (AC+DC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Kit Della Costruzione Del Circuito (AC+DC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάρτηση κατασκευής κυκλωμάτων (AC+DC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kit De la Construcción Del Circuito (AC+DC)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This new version of the CCK adds capacitors, inductors and AC voltage sources to your toolbox! Now you can graph the current and voltage as a function of time.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese neue Version des CCK fügt Kondensatoren, 
Drosselspulen und AC Spannung Quellen Ihrem Toolbox hinzu! Jetzt
können Sie den Strom und die Spannung als Funktion der Zeit graphisch
darstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette nouvelle version du CCK des sources ajoute 
des condensateurs, des inducteurs et Tension CA à votre boîte à 
outils ! Maintenant vous pouvez représenter graphiquement le 
courant et la tension en fonction du temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta versão nova do CCK adiciona capacitores, 
indutores e de tensão AC Fontes a seu toolbox! Agora você pode
representar graficamente a corrente e a tensão em função do tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa nuova versione del CCK aggiunge i 
condensatori, gli induttori e sorgenti di tensione CA Al vostro 
toolbox! Ora potete rappresentare graficamente la corrente e la 
tensione in funzione di tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η νέα έκδοση του CCK προσθέτει τους πυκνωτές,
τα πηνία και τις πηγές τάσης εναλλασσόμενου ρεύματος στην 
εργαλειοθήκη σας! Τώρα μπορείτε να δώσετε με γραφική 
παράσταση το ρεύμα και την τάση ως λειτουργία του χρόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Esta nueva versión del CCK agrega los 
condensadores, los inductores y las fuentes del voltaje ca A su caja 
de herramientas! Ahora usted puede representar la corriente y el
voltaje gra'ficamente en función de tiempo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200893</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104538</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/circuit-construction-kit-ac-dc</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
